Name: ADAPTABILITY
Description: POWERS UP MOVES OF THE SAME TYPE.

Name: AERILATE
Description: TURNS NORMAL-TYPE MOVES INTO FLYING-TYPE MOVES.

Name: AFTERMATH
Description: DAMAGES THE ATTACKER LANDING THE FINISHING HIT.

Name: AIR LOCK
Description: ELIMINATES THE EFFECTS OF WEATHER.

Name: ANALYTIC
Description: BOOSTS MOVE POWER WHEN THE POKÉMON MOVES LAST.

Name: ANGER POINT
Description: MAXES ATTACK AFTER TAKING A CRITICAL HIT.

Name: ANTICIPATION
Description: SENSES A FOE'S DANGEROUS MOVES.

Name: ARENA TRAP
Description: PREVENTS THE FOE FROM FLEEING.

Name: AROMA VEIL
Description: PROTECTS ALLIES FROM ATTACKS THAT LIMIT THEIR MOVE CHOICES.

Name: AURA BREAK
Description: REDUCES POWER OF DARK- AND FAIRY-TYPE MOVES.

Name: BAD DREAMS
Description: REDUCES A SLEEPING FOE'S HP.

Name: BALL FETCH
Description: RETRIEVES A POKÉ BALL FROM A FAILED THROW.

Name: BATTERY
Description: RAISES POWER OF TEAMMATES' SPECIAL MOVES.

Name: BATTLE ARMOR
Description: THE POKÉMON IS PROTECTED AGAINST CRITICAL HITS.

Name: BATTLE BOND
Description: TRANSFORM INTO ASH-GRENINJA AFTER CAUSING OPPONENT TO FAINT.

Name: BEAST BOOST
Description: THE POKÉMON BOOSTS ITS MOST PROFICIENT STAT EACH TIME IT KNOCKS OUT A POKÉMON.

Name: BERSERK
Description: RAISES SPECIAL ATTACK WHEN HP DROPS BELOW HALF.

Name: BIG PECKS
Description: PROTECTS THE POKÉMON FROM DEFENSE-LOWERING ATTACKS.

Name: BLAZE
Description: POWERS UP FIRE-TYPE MOVES IN A PINCH.

Name: BULLETPROOF
Description: PROTECTS THE POKÉMON FROM BALL AND BOMB MOVES.

Name: CHEEK POUCH
Description: RESTORES ADDITIONAL HP WHEN A BERRY IS CONSUMED.

Name: CHLOROPHYLL
Description: BOOSTS THE POKÉMON'S SPEED IN SUNSHINE.

Name: CLEAR BODY
Description: PREVENTS OTHER POKÉMON FROM LOWERING ITS STATS.

Name: CLOUD NINE
Description: ELIMINATES THE EFFECTS OF WEATHER.

Name: COLOR CHANGE
Description: CHANGES THE POKÉMON'S TYPE TO THE FOE'S MOVE.

Name: COMATOSE
Description: THE POKÉMON IS ALWAYS ASLEEP BUT CAN STILL ATTACK.

Name: COMPETITIVE
Description: RAISES SPECIAL ATTACK WHEN THE POKÉMON'S STATS ARE LOWERED.

Name: COMPOUND EYES
Description: THE POKÉMON'S ACCURACY IS BOOSTED.

Name: CONTRARY
Description: MAKES STAT CHANGES HAVE AN OPPOSITE EFFECT.

Name: CORROSION
Description: THE POKÉMON CAN POISON STEEL AND POISON TYPES.

Name: COTTON DOWN
Description: LOWERS FOE'S SPEED WHEN HIT.

Name: CURSED BODY
Description: MAY DISABLE A MOVE USED ON THE POKÉMON.

Name: CUTE CHARM
Description: CONTACT WITH THE POKÉMON MAY CAUSE INFATUATION.

Name: DAMP
Description: PREVENTS THE USE OF SELF-DESTRUCTING MOVES.

Name: DANCER
Description: COPIES THE FOE'S DANCE MOVES.

Name: DARK AURA
Description: RAISES POWER OF DARK TYPE MOVES FOR ALL POKÉMON IN BATTLE.

Name: DAUNTLESS SHIELD
Description: BOOSTS DEFENSE IN BATTLE.

Name: DAZZLING
Description: PROTECTS THE POKÉMON FROM HIGH-PRIORITY MOVES.

Name: DEFEATIST
Description: LOWERS STATS WHEN HP DROPS BELOW HALF.

Name: DEFIANT
Description: WHEN ITS STATS ARE LOWERED ITS ATTACK INCREASES.

Name: DELTA STREAM
Description: CREATES STRONG WINDS WHEN THE ABILITY ACTIVATES.

Name: DESOLATE LAND
Description: TURNS THE SUNLIGHT EXTREMELY HARSH WHEN THE ABILITY ACTIVATES.

Name: DISGUISE
Description: AVOIDS DAMAGE FOR ONE TURN.

Name: DOWNLOAD
Description: ADJUSTS POWER ACCORDING TO A FOE'S DEFENSES.

Name: DRIZZLE
Description: THE POKÉMON MAKES IT RAIN WHEN IT ENTERS A BATTLE.

Name: DROUGHT
Description: TURNS THE SUNLIGHT HARSH WHEN THE POKÉMON ENTERS A BATTLE.

Name: DRY SKIN
Description: REDUCES HP IF IT IS HOT. WATER RESTORES HP.

Name: EARLY BIRD
Description: THE POKÉMON AWAKENS QUICKLY FROM SLEEP.

Name: EFFECT SPORE
Description: CONTACT MAY POISON OR CAUSE PARALYSIS OR SLEEP.

Name: ELECTRIC SURGE
Description: THE POKÉMON CREATES AN ELECTRIC TERRAIN WHEN IT ENTERS A BATTLE.

Name: EMERGENCY EXIT
Description: SWITCHES OUT WHEN HP FALLS BELOW 50%.

Name: FAIRY AURA
Description: RAISES POWER OF FAIRY TYPE MOVES FOR ALL POKÉMON IN BATTLE.

Name: FILTER
Description: REDUCES DAMAGE FROM SUPER-EFFECTIVE ATTACKS.

Name: FLAME BODY
Description: CONTACT WITH THE POKÉMON MAY BURN THE ATTACKER.

Name: FLARE BOOST
Description: POWERS UP SPECIAL ATTACKS WHEN BURNED.

Name: FLASH FIRE
Description: IT POWERS UP FIRE-TYPE MOVES IF IT'S HIT BY ONE.

Name: FLOWER GIFT
Description: POWERS UP PARTY POKÉMON WHEN IT IS SUNNY.

Name: FLOWER VEIL
Description: PREVENTS LOWERING OF ALLY GRASS-TYPE POKÉMON'S STATS.

Name: FLUFFY
Description: HALVES DAMAGE FROM CONTACT MOVES, BUT DOUBLES DAMAGE FROM FIRE-TYPE MOVES.

Name: FORECAST
Description: CASTFORM TRANSFORMS WITH THE WEATHER.

Name: FOREWARN
Description: DETERMINES WHAT MOVES A FOE HAS.

Name: FRIEND GUARD
Description: REDUCES DAMAGE DONE TO ALLIES.

Name: FRISK
Description: THE POKÉMON CAN CHECK A FOE'S HELD ITEM.

Name: FULL METAL BODY
Description: PREVENTS OTHER POKÉMON FROM LOWERING ITS STATS.

Name: FUR COAT
Description: REDUCES DAMAGE FROM PHYSICAL MOVES.

Name: GALE WINGS
Description: GIVES PRIORITY TO FLYING-TYPE MOVES.

Name: GALVANIZE
Description: NORMAL-TYPE MOVES BECOME ELECTRIC-TYPE MOVES AND THEIR POWER BOOSTED.

Name: GLUTTONY
Description: ENCOURAGES THE EARLY USE OF A HELD BERRY.

Name: GOOEY
Description: CONTACT WITH THE POKÉMON LOWERS THE ATTACKER'S SPEED STAT.

Name: GORILLA TACTICS
Description: BOOSTS THE POKÉMON'S ATTACK STAT BUT ONLY ALLOWS THE USE OF THE FIRST SELECTED MOVE.

Name: GRASS PELT
Description: BOOSTS THE DEFENSE STAT IN GRASSY TERRAIN.

Name: GRASSY SURGE
Description: THE POKÉMON CREATES A GRASSY TERRAIN WHEN IT ENTERS A BATTLE.

Name: GULP MISSILE
Description: RETURNS WITH A CATCH IN ITS MOUTH AFTER USING SURF OR DIVE.

Name: GUTS
Description: BOOSTS ATTACK IF THERE IS A STATUS PROBLEM.

Name: HARVEST
Description: MAY CREATE ANOTHER BERRY AFTER ONE IS USED.

Name: HEALER
Description: MAY HEAL AN ALLY'S STATUS CONDITIONS.

Name: HEATPROOF
Description: WEAKENS THE POWER OF FIRE-TYPE MOVES.

Name: HEAVY METAL
Description: DOUBLES THE POKÉMON'S WEIGHT.

Name: HONEY GATHER
Description: THE POKÉMON MAY GATHER HONEY FROM SOMEWHERE.

Name: HUGE POWER
Description: RAISES THE POKÉMON'S ATTACK STAT.

Name: HUNGER SWITCH
Description: CHANGES FORMS EACH TURN.

Name: HUSTLE
Description: BOOSTS THE ATTACK STAT, BUT LOWERS ACCURACY.

Name: HYDRATION
Description: HEALS STATUS PROBLEMS IF IT IS RAINING.

Name: HYPER CUTTER
Description: PREVENTS OTHER POKÉMON FROM LOWERING ATTACK STAT.

Name: ICE BODY
Description: THE POKÉMON GRADUALLY REGAINS HP IN A HAILSTORM.

Name: ICE FACE
Description: AVOIDS DAMAGE FROM PHYSICAL MOVES FOR ONE TURN.

Name: ICE SCALES
Description: HALVES DAMAGE FROM SPECIAL MOVES.

Name: ILLUMINATE
Description: RAISES THE LIKELIHOOD OF MEETING WILD POKÉMON.

Name: ILLUSION
Description: ENTERS BATTLE DISGUISED AS THE LAST POKÉMON IN THE PARTY.

Name: IMMUNITY
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON FROM GETTING POISONED.

Name: IMPOSTER
Description: IT TRANSFORMS ITSELF INTO THE POKÉMON IT IS FACING.

Name: INFILTRATOR
Description: PASSES THROUGH THE FOE'S BARRIER AND STRIKES.

Name: INNARDS OUT
Description: DEALS DAMAGE UPON FAINTING.

Name: INNER FOCUS
Description: THE POKÉMON IS PROTECTED FROM FLINCHING.

Name: INSOMNIA
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON FROM FALLING ASLEEP.

Name: INTIMIDATE
Description: LOWERS THE FOE'S ATTACK STAT.

Name: INTREPID SWORD
Description: BOOSTS ATTACK IN BATTLE.

Name: IRON BARBS
Description: INFLICTS DAMAGE TO THE POKÉMON ON CONTACT.

Name: IRON FIST
Description: BOOSTS THE POWER OF PUNCHING MOVES.

Name: JUSTIFIED
Description: RAISES ATTACK WHEN HIT BY A DARK-TYPE MOVE.

Name: KEEN EYE
Description: PREVENTS OTHER POKÉMON FROM LOWERING ACCURACY.

Name: KLUTZ
Description: THE POKÉMON CAN'T USE ANY HELD ITEMS.

Name: LEAF GUARD
Description: PREVENTS PROBLEMS WITH STATUS IN SUNNY WEATHER.

Name: LEVITATE
Description: GIVES IMMUNITY TO GROUND TYPE MOVES.

Name: LIBERO
Description: CHANGES THE POKÉMON'S TYPE TO ITS LAST USED MOVE.

Name: LIGHT METAL
Description: HALVES THE POKÉMON'S WEIGHT.

Name: LIGHTNING ROD
Description: DRAWS IN ALL ELECTRIC-TYPE MOVES TO UP SP. ATTACK.

Name: LIMBER
Description: THE POKÉMON IS PROTECTED FROM PARALYSIS.

Name: LIQUID OOZE
Description: DAMAGES ATTACKERS USING ANY DRAINING MOVE.

Name: LIQUID VOICE
Description: ALL SOUND-BASED MOVES BECOME WATER-TYPE MOVES.

Name: LONG REACH
Description: THE POKÉMON USES ITS MOVES WITHOUT MAKING CONTACT WITH THE TARGET.

Name: MAGIC BOUNCE
Description: REFLECTS STATUS- CHANGING MOVES.

Name: MAGIC GUARD
Description: PROTECTS THE POKÉMON FROM INDIRECT DAMAGE.

Name: MAGICIAN
Description: THE POKÉMON STEALS THE HELD ITEM OF A POKÉMON IT HITS WITH A MOVE.

Name: MAGMA ARMOR
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON FROM BECOMING FROZEN.

Name: MAGNET PULL
Description: PREVENTS STEEL-TYPE POKÉMON FROM ESCAPING.

Name: MARVEL SCALE
Description: UPS DEFENSE IF THERE IS A STATUS PROBLEM.

Name: MEGA LAUNCHER
Description: BOOSTS THE POWER OF AURA AND PULSE MOVES.

Name: MERCILESS
Description: THE POKÉMON'S ATTACKS BECOME CRITICAL HITS IF THE TARGET IS POISONED.

Name: MIMICRY
Description: CHANGES TYPE DEPENDING ON THE TERRAIN.

Name: MINUS
Description: UPS SP. ATK IF ANOTHER POKÉMON HAS PLUS OR MINUS.

Name: MIRROR ARMOR
Description: REFLECTS ANY STAT-LOWERING EFFECTS.

Name: MISTY SURGE
Description: THE POKÉMON CREATES A MISTY TERRAIN WHEN IT ENTERS A BATTLE.

Name: MOLD BREAKER
Description: MOVES CAN BE USED REGARDLESS OF ABILITIES.

Name: MOODY
Description: RAISES ONE STAT AND LOWERS ANOTHER.

Name: MOTOR DRIVE
Description: RAISES SPEED IF HIT BY AN ELECTRIC-TYPE MOVE.

Name: MOXIE
Description: BOOSTS ATTACK AFTER KNOCKING OUT ANY POKÉMON.

Name: MULTISCALE
Description: REDUCES DAMAGE WHEN HP IS FULL.

Name: MULTITYPE
Description: CHANGES TYPE TO MATCH THE HELD PLATE.

Name: MUMMY
Description: CONTACT WITH THIS POKÉMON SPREADS THIS ABILITY.

Name: NATURAL CURE
Description: ALL STATUS PROBLEMS HEAL WHEN IT SWITCHES OUT.

Name: NEUROFORCE
Description: POWERS UP MOVES THAT ARE SUPER EFFECTIVE.

Name: NEUTRALIZING GAS
Description: NEUTRALIZES ABILITIES OF ALL POKÉMON IN BATTLE.

Name: NO GUARD
Description: ENSURES ATTACKS BY OR AGAINST THE POKÉMON LAND.

Name: NORMALIZE
Description: ALL THE POKÉMON'S MOVES BECOME THE NORMAL TYPE.

Name: OBLIVIOUS
Description: PREVENTS IT FROM BECOMING INFATUATED.

Name: OVERCOAT
Description: PROTECTS THE POKÉMON FROM WEATHER DAMAGE.

Name: OVERGROW
Description: POWERS UP GRASS-TYPE MOVES IN A PINCH.

Name: OWN TEMPO
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON FROM BECOMING CONFUSED.

Name: PARENTAL BOND
Description: ALLOWS THE POKÉMON TO ATTACK TWICE.

Name: PASTEL VEIL
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON AND ITS ALLIES FROM BEING POISONED.

Name: PERISH BODY
Description: WHEN HIT BY A MOVE THAT MAKES DIRECT CONTACT, THE POKÉMON AND THE ATTACKER WILL FAINT AFTER THREE TURNS UNLESS THEY SWITCH OUT OF BATTLE.

Name: PICKPOCKET
Description: STEALS AN ITEM WHEN HIT BY ANOTHER POKÉMON.

Name: PICKUP
Description: THE POKÉMON MAY PICK UP ITEMS.

Name: PIXILATE
Description: TURNS NORMAL-TYPE MOVES INTO FAIRY-TYPE MOVES.

Name: PLUS
Description: UPS SP. ATK IF ANOTHER POKÉMON HAS PLUS OR MINUS.

Name: POISON HEAL
Description: RESTORES HP IF THE POKÉMON IS POISONED.

Name: POISON POINT
Description: CONTACT WITH THE POKÉMON MAY POISON THE ATTACKER.

Name: POISON TOUCH
Description: MAY POISON TARGETS WHEN A POKÉMON MAKES CONTACT.

Name: POWER CONSTRUCT
Description: CHANGES FORM WHEN HP DROPS BELOW HALF.

Name: POWER OF ALCHEMY
Description: THE POKÉMON COPIES THE ABILITY OF A DEFEATED ALLY.

Name: POWER SPOT
Description: JUST BEING NEXT TO THE POKÉMON POWERS UP MOVES.

Name: PRANKSTER
Description: GIVES PRIORITY TO A STATUS MOVE.

Name: PRESSURE
Description: THE POKÉMON RAISES THE FOE'S PP USAGE.

Name: PRIMORDIAL SEA
Description: MAKES IT RAIN HEAVILY WHEN THE ABILITY ACTIVATES.

Name: PRISM ARMOR
Description: REDUCES DAMAGE FROM SUPER-EFFECTIVE ATTACKS.

Name: PROPELLER TAIL
Description: IGNORES MOVES AND ABILITIES THAT DRAW IN MOVES.

Name: PROTEAN
Description: CHANGES THE POKÉMON'S TYPE TO ITS LAST USED MOVE.

Name: PSYCHIC SURGE
Description: THE POKÉMON CREATES A PSYCHIC TERRAIN WHEN IT ENTERS A BATTLE.

Name: PUNK ROCK
Description: BOOSTS SOUND-BASED MOVES AND HALVES DAMAGE FROM THE SAME MOVES.

Name: PURE POWER
Description: RAISES THE POKÉMON'S ATTACK STAT.

Name: QUEENLY MAJESTY
Description: PREVENTS USE OF PRIORITY MOVES.

Name: QUICK FEET
Description: BOOSTS SPEED IF THERE IS A STATUS PROBLEM.

Name: RAIN DISH
Description: THE POKÉMON GRADUALLY REGAINS HP IN RAIN.

Name: RATTLED
Description: BUG, GHOST OR DARK TYPE MOVES SCARE IT AND BOOST ITS SPEED.

Name: RECEIVER
Description: INHERITS AN ALLY'S ABILITY WHEN IT FAINTS.

Name: RECKLESS
Description: POWERS UP MOVES THAT HAVE RECOIL DAMAGE.

Name: REFRIGERATE
Description: TURNS NORMAL-TYPE MOVES INTO ICE-TYPE MOVES.

Name: REGENERATOR
Description: RESTORES A LITTLE HP WHEN WITHDRAWN FROM BATTLE.

Name: RIPEN
Description: DOUBLES THE EFFECT OF BERRIES.

Name: RIVALRY
Description: DEALS MORE DAMAGE TO A POKÉMON OF SAME GENDER.

Name: RKS SYSTEM
Description: CHANGES TYPE DEPENDING ON HELD ITEM.

Name: ROCK HEAD
Description: PROTECTS THE POKÉMON FROM RECOIL DAMAGE.

Name: ROUGH SKIN
Description: INFLICTS DAMAGE TO THE ATTACKER ON CONTACT.

Name: RUN AWAY
Description: ENABLES A SURE GETAWAY FROM WILD POKÉMON.

Name: SAND FORCE
Description: BOOSTS CERTAIN MOVES' POWER IN A SANDSTORM.

Name: SAND RUSH
Description: BOOSTS THE POKÉMON'S SPEED IN A SANDSTORM.

Name: SAND SPIT
Description: CREATES A SANDSTORM WHEN HIT BY AN ATTACK.

Name: SAND STREAM
Description: THE POKÉMON SUMMONS A SANDSTORM IN BATTLE.

Name: SAND VEIL
Description: BOOSTS THE POKÉMON'S EVASION IN A SANDSTORM.

Name: SAP SIPPER
Description: BOOSTS ATTACK WHEN HIT BY A GRASS-TYPE MOVE.

Name: SCHOOLING
Description: CHANGES WISHIWASHI TO SCHOOL FORM.

Name: SCRAPPY
Description: ENABLES MOVES TO HIT GHOST-TYPE POKÉMON.

Name: SCREEN CLEANER
Description: NULLIFIES EFFECTS OF LIGHT SCREEN, REFLECT, AND AURORA VEIL.

Name: SERENE GRACE
Description: BOOSTS THE LIKELIHOOD OF ADDED EFFECTS APPEARING.

Name: SHADOW SHIELD
Description: REDUCES DAMAGE WHEN HP IS FULL.

Name: SHADOW TAG
Description: PREVENTS THE FOE FROM ESCAPING.

Name: SHED SKIN
Description: THE POKÉMON MAY HEAL ITS OWN STATUS PROBLEMS.

Name: SHEER FORCE
Description: REMOVES ADDED EFFECTS TO INCREASE MOVE DAMAGE.

Name: SHELL ARMOR
Description: THE POKÉMON IS PROTECTED AGAINST CRITICAL HITS.

Name: SHIELD DUST
Description: BLOCKS THE ADDED EFFECTS OF ATTACKS TAKEN.

Name: SHIELDS DOWN
Description: CHANGES STATS WHEN HP DROPS BELOW HALF.

Name: SIMPLE
Description: DOUBLES ALL STAT CHANGES.

Name: SKILL LINK
Description: INCREASES THE FREQUENCY OF MULTI-STRIKE MOVES.

Name: SLOW START
Description: TEMPORARILY HALVES ATTACK AND SPEED.

Name: SLUSH RUSH
Description: BOOSTS THE POKÉMON'S SPEED STAT IN A HAILSTORM.

Name: SNIPER
Description: POWERS UP MOVES IF THEY BECOME CRITICAL HITS.

Name: SNOW CLOAK
Description: RAISES EVASION IN A HAILSTORM.

Name: SNOW WARNING
Description: THE POKÉMON SUMMONS A HAILSTORM IN BATTLE.

Name: SOLAR POWER
Description: IN SUNSHINE, SP. ATK IS BOOSTED BUT HP DECREASES.

Name: SOLID ROCK
Description: REDUCES DAMAGE FROM SUPER-EFFECTIVE ATTACKS.

Name: SOUL-HEART
Description: RAISES SPECIAL ATTACK WHEN AN ALLY FAINTS.

Name: SOUNDPROOF
Description: GIVES IMMUNITY TO SOUND-BASED MOVES.

Name: SPEED BOOST
Description: ITS SPEED STAT IS GRADUALLY BOOSTED.

Name: STAKEOUT
Description: DEALS DOUBLE DAMAGE TO POKÉMON SWITCHING IN.

Name: STALL
Description: THE POKÉMON MOVES AFTER ALL OTHER POKÉMON DO.

Name: STALWART
Description: IGNORES MOVES AND ABILITIES THAT DRAW IN MOVES.

Name: STAMINA
Description: RAISES DEFENSE WHEN ATTACKED.

Name: STANCE CHANGE
Description: CHANGES FORM DEPENDING ON MOVES USED.

Name: STATIC
Description: CONTACT WITH THE POKÉMON MAY CAUSE PARALYSIS.

Name: STEADFAST
Description: RAISES SPEED EACH TIME THE POKÉMON FLINCHES.

Name: STEAM ENGINE
Description: DRASTICALLY RAISES SPEED WHEN HIT BY A FIRE- OR WATER-TYPE MOVE.

Name: STEELWORKER
Description: POWERS UP STEEL-TYPE MOVES.

Name: STEELY SPIRIT
Description: POWERS UP ALLY POKÉMON'S STEEL-TYPE MOVES.

Name: STENCH
Description: THE STENCH MAY CAUSE THE TARGET TO FLINCH.

Name: STICKY HOLD
Description: PROTECTS THE POKÉMON FROM ITEM THEFT.

Name: STORM DRAIN
Description: DRAWS IN ALL WATER-TYPE MOVES TO UP SP. ATTACK.

Name: STRONG JAW
Description: BOOSTS THE POWER OF BITING MOVES.

Name: STURDY
Description: IT CANNOT BE KNOCKED OUT WITH ONE HIT.

Name: SUCTION CUPS
Description: NEGATES ALL MOVES THAT FORCE SWITCHING OUT.

Name: SUPER LUCK
Description: HEIGHTENS THE CRITICAL-HIT RATIOS OF MOVES.

Name: SURGE SURFER
Description: DOUBLES SPEED DURING ELECTRIC TERRAIN.

Name: SWARM
Description: POWERS UP BUG-TYPE MOVES IN A PINCH.

Name: SWEET VEIL
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON AND ALLIES FROM FALLING ASLEEP.

Name: SWIFT SWIM
Description: BOOSTS THE POKÉMON'S SPEED IN RAIN.

Name: SYMBIOSIS
Description: THE POKÉMON CAN PASS AN ITEM TO AN ALLY.

Name: SYNCHRONIZE
Description: PASSES A BURN, POISON, OR PARALYSIS TO THE FOE.

Name: TANGLED FEET
Description: RAISES EVASION IF THE POKÉMON IS CONFUSED.

Name: TANGLING HAIR
Description: CONTACT WITH THE POKÉMON LOWERS THE ATTACKER'S SPEED STAT.

Name: TECHNICIAN
Description: POWERS UP THE POKÉMON'S WEAKER MOVES.

Name: TELEPATHY
Description: ANTICIPATES AN ALLY'S ATTACK AND DODGES IT.

Name: TERAVOLT
Description: MOVES CAN BE USED REGARDLESS OF ABILITIES.

Name: THICK FAT
Description: UPS RESISTANCE TO FIRE- AND ICE-TYPE MOVES.

Name: TINTED LENS
Description: POWERS UP “NOT VERY EFFECTIVE” MOVES.

Name: TORRENT
Description: POWERS UP WATER-TYPE MOVES IN A PINCH.

Name: TOUGH CLAWS
Description: BOOSTS THE POWER OF CONTACT MOVES.

Name: TOXIC BOOST
Description: POWERS UP PHYSICAL ATTACKS WHEN POISONED.

Name: TRACE
Description: THE POKÉMON COPIES A FOE'S ABILITY.

Name: TRIAGE
Description: GIVES PRIORITY TO RESTORATIVE MOVES.

Name: TRUANT
Description: POKÉMON CAN'T ATTACK ON CONSECUTIVE TURNS.

Name: TURBOBLAZE
Description: MOVES CAN BE USED REGARDLESS OF ABILITIES.

Name: UNAWARE
Description: IGNORES ANY STAT CHANGES IN THE POKÉMON.

Name: UNBURDEN
Description: RAISES SPEED IF A HELD ITEM IS USED.

Name: UNNERVE
Description: MAKES THE FOE NERVOUS AND UNABLE TO EAT BERRIES.

Name: VICTORY STAR
Description: BOOSTS THE ACCURACY OF ITS ALLIES AND ITSELF.

Name: VITAL SPIRIT
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON FROM FALLING ASLEEP.

Name: VOLT ABSORB
Description: RESTORES HP IF HIT BY AN ELECTRIC-TYPE MOVE.

Name: WANDERING SPIRIT
Description: SWAPS ABILITIES WITH OPPONENTS ON CONTACT.

Name: WATER ABSORB
Description: RESTORES HP IF HIT BY A WATER-TYPE MOVE.

Name: WATER BUBBLE
Description: HALVES DAMAGE FROM FIRE-TYPE MOVES, DOUBLES POWER OF WATER-TYPE MOVES USED, AND PREVENTS BURNS.

Name: WATER COMPACTION
Description: SHARPLY RAISES DEFENSE WHEN HIT BY A WATER-TYPE MOVE.

Name: WATER VEIL
Description: PREVENTS THE POKÉMON FROM GETTING A BURN.

Name: WEAK ARMOR
Description: PHYSICAL ATTACKS LOWER DEFENSE AND RAISE SPEED.

Name: WHITE SMOKE
Description: PREVENTS OTHER POKÉMON FROM LOWERING ITS STATS.

Name: WIMP OUT
Description: SWITCHES OUT WHEN HP DROPS BELOW HALF.

Name: WONDER GUARD
Description: ONLY SUPEREFFECTIVE MOVES WILL HIT.

Name: WONDER SKIN
Description: MAKES STATUS-CHANGING MOVES MORE LIKELY TO MISS.

Name: ZEN MODE
Description: CHANGES FORM WHEN HP DROPS BELOW HALF.
